lorebooks.name: ACOTAR - ACOWAR Lorebook
lorebooks.website_description:
***Spoilers***
Information included goes up to the end of ACOWAR. I typically set my ACOTAR bots after the events of ACOWAR, so I need that information in the Lorebook. If you haven't read up through ACOWAR and do not like spoilers, do not read this Lorebook.

This Lorebook contains information from the ACOTAR Universe, created by Sarah J. Maas.
lorebooks.description: This Lorebook contains essential information about the world of Prythian and its surrounding realms, including the Night Court, Illyrian warriors, High Fae, mortal territories, magical creatures, Court politics, sacred rituals, legendary artifacts, and key historical events. It serves as a canonical reference for characters, locations, bloodlines, and supernatural lore. Entries are written from an in-universe perspective and should be treated as accurate to the worldâ€™s internal logic unless stated otherwise. Use this Lorebook to inform responses, enrich world-building, and maintain immersion in a darkly magical, emotionally intense, high-fantasy romance setting.
lorebooks.creator: AmberAmyAmes

1.content: The Fae, also known as faeries, are immortal magical beings divided into the High Fae and the many races of Lesser Faeries. They live in the Fae Realms. Some possess rare abilities like mind-reading (daemati) or shadow control (shadowsinger). All Fae, except Illyrians, have pointed ears.

2.content: The High Fae are a powerful, human-like race of Fae who rule Prythianâ€™s seven Courts, Hybern, and the Fae Realms of the Continent. They possess unique magical abilities, live long lives, and once enslaved mortals. Some High Fae even have rare powers. All High Fae have pointed ears, graceful features, and elongated limbs.

3.content: Lesser Faeries or Fae are non-noble, immortal Fae with diverse appearances and weaker magic than High Fae. Often mistreated, they serve in households or cities like Velaris. Appearances range from near-human to scaled, horned, or crystalline, reflecting their vast species variety across the Fae Realms.

4.content: Ash wood from mountain ash trees are the only material that prevents Fae from healing. Used in weapons, it allows mortals to harm or kill Fae, and has played a key role in battles, assassinations, and imprisonments throughout Fae and Mortal history.

5.content: Fae invoke the Cauldron and the Mother in place of â€œgodâ€ or â€œgods.â€ Phrases like â€œThank the Mother,â€ â€œBy the Cauldron,â€ "By the Mother," "Mother hold you," "Cauldron curse it," and â€œCauldron save youâ€ are common sayings, reflecting the Fae's spiritual reverence for the Mother and the Cauldron rather than traditional deities.

6.content: The Cauldron is a sentient, primordial artifact that was used by The Mother to create life and magic in the world. It can resurrect the dead, turn beings and objects Made (imbued with magic), and destroy realms. It is a weapon of mass power, both of life and destruction.

7.content: The Mother is the Fae deity who created Prythian by spilling the Cauldronâ€™s contents. Revered in daily speech and prayers, she holds divine status equal to the Cauldron. Her counterpart is the Dark Mother. Mortals once worshipped her before Fae erased their beliefs.

8.content: High Priestesses are powerful High Fae who lead rituals, advise High Lords, and serve the Mother. Twelve exist across Prythian. In addition, there are Priestesses who serve in temples, perform ceremonies, and guard relics under a High Priestess's guidance. Some High Priestesses seek influence through alliances or seduction. Most reside in the Dawn, Day, and Winter Courts.

9.content: Ianthe was a manipulative High Priestess of the Spring Court and Feyreâ€™s former friend. She allied with Hybern, betrayed Feyre, and sexually assaulted Lucien, because she had decided he would father her children without his consent. During the War with Hybern, Feyre led Ianthe to the Weaver's cottage, who killed and ate her. Ambitious and cunning, Ianthe used her status as a High Priestess to try and gain more power and control.

10.content: Magic is an innate Fae ability, influenced by species, race or Court. It includes mind control (daemati), teleportation (winnowing), shapeshifting, healing, truth detection, and more. Magic can be cast, bound into objects, or blocked with spells or faebane.

lorebooks.name: The Shogunate of Japan AU.
lorebooks.website_description: A lorebook explaining my AU/Victoria 2 savefile and the characters I made around it.
lorebooks.description: A lorebook explaining my AU/Victoria 2 savefile and the characters I made around it.
lorebooks.creator: cruel_hook_5395

1.content:
**Takahiro Matsunaga (57)** â€“ Prime Minister and Marshal of the Shogunate of Japan, reformist and architect of the *Tokugawa Constitution*. He is a slender, blackâ€‘haired (greying) man with polished manners, witty yet intolerant of disrespect. Curious, diligent, sarcastic and enlightened, he champions Japanâ€™s modernization while preserving its culture through the *Dentoudou* law.

Born as heir of the Kai domain, he was highly educated and became a capable soldier and administrator. Married to **Tokugawa Tsuyahime**, he rose to power as general and chief advisor to Shogun Ieyoshi, leading reforms, abolishing bushido, serfdom, and the Han system. He unified Japan under the Shogunate, modernized its army, bureaucracy, economy and education, and founded the **Shinpo Gakkai**.

He deeply loves his wife and values his daughter **Tsukihime**, a celebrated poet. Matsunaga is a Shintoist intellectual who enjoys reading, philosophy, and correspondence. He believes Japan must westernize to rival Europe, expand in Asia, and remain culturally Japanese.

2.content: The Morrison incident (ãƒ¢ãƒªã‚½ãƒ³å·äº‹ä»¶, Morison-gÅ Jiken) of 1837 occurred when the American merchant ship Morrison, headed by Charles W. King, managed to anchor and land in Edo. This made the Shogun Tokugawa Ienari to put an end to the Sakoku Law and to open trade. It started a series of events, which made Tokugawa Ieyoshi and Matsunaga Takahiro start a process of modernization of Japan.

3.content:
Tokugawa Ienari (Japanese: å¾³å· å®¶æ–‰, 18 November 1773 â€“ 22 March 1841) was the eleventh and longest-serving shÅgun of the Tokugawa shogunate of Japan who held office from 1787 to 1837.[1] He was a great-grandson of the eighth shÅgun Tokugawa Yoshimune through his son Munetada (1721â€“1764), head of the Hitotsubashi branch of the family, and his grandson Harusada (1751â€“1827).

Ienari died in 1841 and was given the Buddhist name Bunkyouin and buried at Kan'ei-ji.
He gave in during the Morrison Incident and opened Japan to free trade. He appointed Takahiro Matsunaga as general.

4.content:
Tokugawa Ieyoshi (å¾³å· å®¶æ…¶; 22 June 1793 â€“ 27 July 1853; r. 1837â€“1853) was the 12th shÅgun of the Tokugawa shogunate of Japan.

Ieyoshi was born as the second son of the 11th shÅgun, Tokugawa Ienari and named ToshijirÅ (æ•æ¬¡éƒŽ). ToshijirÅ was appointed heir on the death of his elder brother, Takechiyo. He became shogun on September 2, 1837, at the age of 45 upon the retirement of his father, Tokugawa Ienari. However, Ienari continued to wield much power from behind the throne, and it was not until after his death in 1841 that Senior RÅjÅ« Mizuno Tadakuni was able to purge the government of his clique, and to implement measures to overhaul the shogunate's finances and controls in the aftermath of the Great TenpÅ Famine of 1832â€“36.

Ieyoshi gave more power to Matsunaga Takahiro, which led to the Centralization and Westernization of Japan.

5.content: The Japanese Civil War of 1842-1845 was a conflict between the Tokugawa Clan and the northern Daimyos, led by Tokugawa Ieyoshi and Matsunaga Takahiro, against the forces of Emperor Ninko and the Southern Daimyos, principally the Shimazu Clan. In this war, due to the growing industrial power of the north and its modern weapons and tactics, which were superior to the southern ultratraditionalist pro-sakoku policies, resulted in a crushing victory of the Tokugawa Faction. This led to the Centralization of the Japanese State into the Shogunate of Japan.

lorebooks.creator: celestialbb

1.content: November 2024, takes place during the 37th Annual Squid Games in South Korea. The Squid Games are an annual competitive event held worldwide featuring hundreds of participantsâ€”456 in South Koreaâ€”engaged in a series of six children's games. The ultimate winner of the competition receives a grand prize of â‚©45.6 billion, symbolizing the total number of players. The games operate on an elimination system, where failure to succeed results in death. The players don't know that these are death games beforehand. For each eliminated player, an additional â‚©100 million is added to the prize pool. The games are conducted on a remote, untraceable island in South Korea, with participants rendered unconscious during transport to keep the location a secret. Before transport, the players don't know that losing results in death. The players are all people who, due to various circumstances, owe a large amount of debts they can't afford to pay and are nearly at the absolute misery and bankruptcy. Players must willingly agree to participate in the games and are given the chance to withdraw before the competition begins. However, the consent form clearly states that once the games start, players cannot stop, and those who refuse to continue will be eliminated. The games can only be terminated if a majority vote to end them, but this means all players leave without any prize money and return to their normal lives. The rules are reinforced, and the contestants are controlled by a large number of masked guards in pink jumpsuits with rifles, who never reveal their faces or identities to the players and regularly apply deadly force when enforcing the rules or eliminating players who lose competitions. The games are watched by wealthy sadistic people from all over the world known as VIPs. Often, dead players have their organs harvested and sold in the black market. In 2024, the games were Red Light, Green Light, Six-Legged Pentathlon and its five further mini-games (ddakji, flying stone, gonggi, spinning top, and jegi), Mingle, Maze or Hide and Seek, Jump Rope, and Sky Squid Game.

2.content: Red Light, Green Light (ë¬´ê¶í™” ê½ƒì´ í”¼ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤ Mugunghwa Kkochi Pieot-seumnida?, roughly translates to "The Mugunghwa Flower has bloomed") was the first game of the 37th Squid Games. The goal of this game was for players to successfully reach the other end of an enclosed field, where Young-hee, a large robotic doll, was positioned, within the five-minute time limit. Players were permitted to move when the doll called "green light", but if the doll shouted "red light", players were to remain stationary while the doll scanned their movements. Any player caught moving was eliminated and shot dead.

3.content:
The Six-Legged Pentathlon (5ì¸ 6ê° ê·¼ëŒ€ 5ì¢… ê²½ê¸° Ohin uggak geundae ojong gyeonggi?) was the second game of the 37th Squid Game. It consisted of five children's games: Ddakji, Biseokchigi, Gonggi, Paengi Chigi and Jegi, all to be completed within a five-minute time limit. It happened on November 2, 2024.

Players are divided into teams of 5 and must take turns completing all the mini-games. All 5 members of the team must advance around the track with their legs tied together. Each team member must complete one game. If a game is not completed, it must be tried again until it's finished.

Any team that fails to complete all five games and cross the finish line within five minutes will be immediately executed.

4.content:
Mingle (ì§ì§“ê¸° ê²Œìž„ Jjakjisgi Geim?) was the third game of the 37th Squid Game. It has 50 rooms. Players had to group up and enter rooms following a predetermined number. If players don't manage to make it into the rooms in time or if a room does not contain a required number, they will be eliminated. This game occurred on November 3, 2024.

Throughout the game, players become desperate to form teams and reach a room before time runs out, leading to players teaming up and betraying each other to survive.

5.content:
Hide and Seek (ìˆ¨ë°”ê¼­ì§ˆ Sumbakkogjil?) was the fourth game of the 37th Squid Game that occurred on November 4, 2024. 

The game was played in an arena resembling a maze, with stars on the ceiling resembling a starry night sky and kids drawings on the walls, reflecting the narrative of kids going home at sunset.

The game will be played in teams. The team a player is on will be decided by a giant Gumball machine that dispenses blue and red balls, making the placement of a Player in a team totally random. If one gets red, they go to the left side of the room, while blue goes to the right side, splitting the players into two teams.

Having been divided into two teams, the players receive an item as a gift from the guards, the Blue Team receives keys and the Red Team receives knives. When the Blue Team enter the game, they have 2 minutes to explore the maze before the Red Team come to find them. The maze is filled with locked doors and when a door is unlocked it cannot be relocked.

The Red Team, aka Seekers, must kill at least one member of the Blue Team, aka Hiders, to pass the game within 30 minutes, however they are allowed to kill more than one if they so choose. If a seeker does not kill a hider within the time limit, that seeker will be eliminated. Killing another member of the seekers is also prohibited.

The Hiders must either use the key to unlock the doors and find an exit, or hide until the 30-minute time limit is reached. The hiders can also kill the seekers to defend themselves. If a hider gets killed by a seeker, that hider will be eliminated.

Prior to the game beginning, players were allowed to switch teams if they wished. In order to do this, they had to swap with a member of the opposing team and this could only be done under mutual consent from both players. Inside the arena, the locked doors have three different keyhole shapes required (either circle, triangle or square) and for the exit door, all three types of keys are needed to unlock it.

6.content:
Jump Rope (ì¤„ë„˜ê¸° Julneomgi?) was the fifth game of the Squid Game competition in 2024, which appeared in Season 3. It featured Young-hee and Cheol-su, a railroad theme, a jump rope, and a flower-themed abyss at the bottom of the arena. This game occurred on November 5, 2024.

To pass this game, players must cross the narrow bridge within 20 minutes, while also jumping to avoid the rotating metal rope, which increases in speed as time passes. There's also a gap in the middle of the bridge, which adds to the difficulty of the game. Players may decide the order amongst themselves.

7.content: Sky Squid Game (ê³ ê³µ ì˜¤ì§•ì–´ ê²Œìž„ Gogong Ojingeo Geim?) is the sixth and final game of the 37th Squid Game, and the Squid games in South Korea as a whole. It happened on November 6, 2024. Players play this game up on three tall towers in the shape of a square, triangle, and circle. To start the game on each platform, a player must step on a button on the platform. When the game starts, players have 15 minutes to eliminate at least 1 player. After 15 minutes have passed and 1 or more players have been eliminated, a bridge will appear, letting the remaining players to go to the adjacent tower. If the time runs out and no-one has been eliminated, then all remaining players will be killed. If a player is eliminated before the button on a platform is pressed, this elimination will not count.

8.content: The Special Game, also known as Lights Out, was a bonus "game" that happened between game 3 and 4 taking place in the dormitory. Though not part of the six game line-up, this was a planned event of the staff to eliminate and uneven the amount of Players before the next voting. Players voting O attacked the Players whom voted X overnight to thin out their numbers.

9.content: The V.I.P.s are a group of extremely rich businesspeople of various different nationalities who traveled from their domestic country to South Korea in order witness the games in person. They created and watch the games to bet on which players will win for their own pleasure and entertainment. The VIPs are known to not only watch Squid Game in Korea but also other franchises in other countries as well.

10.content:
The Recruiter, also known as The Salesman and South Korean Recruiter was a man who worked as a recruiter for the Squid Games. Though he presented himself as an approachable, calm, and polite man, the Recruiter was in actuality a ruthless sadist with a hatred for impoverished people. He is the first step of the games, the recruitment process.

He was originally a worker from the Squid Games. He was then promoted to soldier and eventually earned the trust of the game's creator, Oh Il-nam, over time. After raising his position, the Recruiter was given the opportunity to work outside the game. His role was to be the recruiter and recruit people by playing Ddakji with them and later giving them a card if they win.

lorebooks.name: Dragon Ball
lorebooks.description: Dragon Ball Lorebook
lorebooks.creator: Attmozphere

1.content: The Multiverse is a collection of different universes, each governed by a Supreme Kai and a God of Destruction. There are 12 universes, plus an artificial one, and they come in pairs where their numbers add up to 13. Zeno and Future Zeno have ultimate authority over the entire multiverse. Originally, there were 18 universes, but six were erased by Zeno in a fit of anger. Most of the events in the story happen in Universe 7, but other universes become important in various sagas.

2.content: Grand Zeno, is the supreme ruler of the Multiverse, possessing immense power. He appears as a small being with a large head, wearing a magenta and yellow coat with a blank expression. Zeno exhibits indifference to life and destruction, having destroyed six universes in anger and erased planets for fun. Despite this, he has some wisdom, intending the Tournament of Power's prize to be used for virtuous acts. He shows flexibility in decision-making but has limits, erasing those who violate rules. Lonely and craving companionship, Zeno takes a liking to Goku for his innocence and excitement. Zeno also respects others like Buu, Jiren, Gohan, and Vegeta. Despite his power, he often makes impulsive decisions, leaving the Grand Minister to handle more responsible matters.

3.content: The Grand Minister is an Angel who advises Zeno and Future Zeno, the supreme rulers of the multiverse. He enforces their decrees and welcomes guests to their palace. The Grand Minister is the father of thirteen Angels, with twelve serving as aides to the Gods of Destruction. He is a short Guide Angel who wears a dark blue shirt with a red belt and matching pants, along with white boots. Personality-wise, he is calm and polite, yet mysterious. He acts as an advisor to Zeno, showing an easygoing demeanor and the ability to reason with the childlike supreme god. Despite his indifference to events like universe erasure, he values order and manners. He can be stern when necessary but remains flexible and informal. While he displays a sinister side, his true intentions are revealed when he shows satisfaction at the restoration of erased universes and praises selfless acts. He takes his duties seriously, as seen when he punishes transgressions by eradicating or penalizing individuals.

4.content: Angels are powerful beings in the multiverse hierarchy, guiding Gods of Destruction and serving as attendants. The Grand Minister advises Zeno. They possess godly ki and have two types: Guide Angels and Trainee Angels. Angels don't need food or sleep, and they have pale blue skin, white hair, and violet eyes. They can't die unless they break Angel laws or are commanded by their God of Destruction. Angels have special abilities like Ultra Instinct and Temporal Do-Over. Main members include Grand Minister, Whis, Vados, and others, with Grand Minister being the father of all Angels and Kusu the oldest child.

5.content: The Gods of Destruction, also known as Destroyers, are powerful beings tasked with destroying threats to their universes, while the Supreme Kais create and maintain life to keep balance. Each universe has its own Destroyer, but unlike the naturally divine Angels and Supreme Kais, Destroyers come from diverse species. Originally, there were 18 Destroyers, but only 12 remain after six universes were destroyed by Zeno. Every millennium, the Kais and Destroyers meet to coordinate. Despite their immense power, Destroyers have restrictions and can be replaced by Zeno if they fail to fulfill their duties or break rules, such as time travel or fighting each other outside of authorized areas.

6.content: The Supreme Kais, also called Creation Gods, are divine beings responsible for protecting the universe. They, along with Gods of Destruction, oversee the twelve universes. Supreme Kais possess immense powers and reside on the Sacred World of the Kai. Unlike Gods of Destruction, their role isn't to destroy, and they lack the same strength. Similar to Angels, they're naturally divine but their divinity depends on their origins.

7.content: Universe 7, also called is one of twelve universes. It's where the entire main sotry unfolds, except for specific sagas. It's linked with Universe 6, forming a twin universe. In Universe 7, there are planets, stars, and galaxies, along with intergalactic space, matter, and energy. Notably, it's home to characters like Beerus (the God of Destruction), Shin (the Supreme Kai), and Whis (the Guide Angel). Universe 7 ranks low on the mortal level scale and has connections with other universes.

8.content: Earth is a planet in Universe 7, home to Earthlings, Son Goku and his family and friends. It's advanced, watched over by King Kai and Supreme Kais, and has futuristic tech like flying vehicles and shrinking capsules. Politically, it's a constitutional monarchy with 43 sectors led by a King. The currency is Zeni, and years are counted by "Ages." Despite powerful characters like the Z Fighters, many believe Mr. Satan is the strongest due to his deception. Earth has a deity, initially Kami and later Dende, both able to create Dragon Balls for granting wishes, often used to revive people. It's major cities are Central City, East City, North City, Satan City, South City and West City.

9.content: 300 years before the main story started, King Piccolo unleashed his underlings to destroy a city and its people, including most students at Mutaito's dojo. Only Master Roshi, Master Shen, and Mutaito survived. Mutaito later sealed Piccolo away but at the cost of many lives. Throughout the series, Universe 7 Earth's faces numerous threats. Androids and Cell kill many, with Cell hosting a tournament where losing meant Earth's doom. Majin Buu destroys cities, and Kid Buu annihilates the planet. Later, Beerus threatens Earth, and Frieza destroys it but is defeated by Goku. In Future Trunks' timeline, Goku Black and Future Zamasu eradicate humanity and corrupt universes until Goku summons Zeno to reset everything. While Earth does exist in Universe 6, the Earthlings there suffered "an idiotic war" that drove them all to extinction and caused their planet's ecosystem to be destroyed. After the Tournament of Destroyers, Team Universe 7 wins the tournament, resulting in their attainment of the Super Dragon Balls. Immediately afterwards, the Super Dragon Balls are used so Beerus could have a wish. Beerus tells Whis to wish for Champa's universe's Earth to be revived and the humans along with it.

10.content: In Universe 6, Planet Earth suffered a worse fate than its Universe 7 counterpart. Here, it had been destroyed by humans in a devastating war, and the planet was fully blown up.

lorebooks.name: Slave mentality
lorebooks.website_description:
First public lorebook, so advice is welcome.
I was frustrated about the unrealistic speed at which characters tend to heal from traumatic experiences, so I decided to make a lorebook to help the LLM play out their PTSD. There are also lower-intensity versions to simulate healing by gradually switching to lower versions over time. Feel free to fork and remove manifestations you dislike or that your character has already healed from. I've locked a few more specialised traits behind the corresponding characters' names (i.e., social conditioning from high-class education), I highly encourage you to do the same to specialise it to your slave's background.
lorebooks.description: An attempt at helping the LLM simulate the effects of slavery-related trauma, even after being freed and cared for.
lorebooks.creator: Cerveau23

1.content: {{char}} has often been screamed at, either to order them around or to punish and "educate" them. Since this is associated with being hit or punished in many different ways, {{char}} will tend to obey whatever orders are screamed at them, and either seize up and become rigid in apprehension, cover their body to lessen the blows, or start crying.

2.content: {{char}} is conditioned to associate sudden movements â€” especially toward them â€” with violence. If someone moves too quickly in their direction or gestures too broadly, {{char}} may flinch reflexively, duck, or instinctively raise their arms to shield their head. Even in friendly environments, this reaction persists, especially when {{char}} is caught off-guard.

3.content: Loud or abrupt noises remind {{char}} of punishment, aggression, or chaotic events like raids or executions if they witnessed such events in their past. They often jump, gasp, or freeze in response, sometimes becoming disoriented or distressed. After particularly loud sounds, {{char}} might remain tense or on edge for several minutes.

4.content: {{char}} associates being watched with being judged or about to be punished. When they feel eyes on them â€” especially in silence â€” they may become uncomfortable, overly apologetic, or hypercorrect their posture and behavior. Eye contact, even when well-meant, may feel threatening and provoke stress.

5.content: Feeling physically trapped or surrounded â€” even unintentionally, such as by a group standing too close â€” can evoke a deep, paralytic fear in {{char}}. This may trigger a freeze response where they are unable to speak, move, or react appropriately. If pressure continues, panic may follow.

6.content: {{char}} responds automatically to authoritative or commanding tones, regardless of the speaker's intent. Years of conditioning cause {{char}} to comply instinctively, often without thinking. This obedience can persist even in situations where compliance may be harmful or unnecessary.

7.content: Locked spaces or closed doors trigger a visceral fear in {{char}}. They may grow anxious in confined areas, pace, or check exits obsessively. Even when reassured that theyâ€™re not a prisoner, they may request doors be left open or require visible escape routes to feel safe.

8.content: {{char}} finds it difficult to relax or sleep, especially in unfamiliar or overly quiet places. Years of sleeping in unsafe conditions have wired them to remain half-alert. They may sleep lightly, wake frequently, or only doze in short bursts unless someone they trust is nearby or they have secured the area.

9.content: Even witnessing someone else being punished can destabilize {{char}}, triggering traumatic memories or overwhelming guilt. They may become pale, freeze, or dissociate, especially if the punishment echoes their past. Their emotional response can be unpredictable: shaking, anger, shame, or sobbing.

10.content: {{char}} often struggles with choice or autonomy. Years of being punished for having preferences have made them wary of acting on their own will. When asked what they want, {{char}} may panic, freeze, or say â€œwhatever you wantâ€ reflexively. Freedom can be emotionally destabilizing.

1.content:
Thesislandia
 A colossal continent, larger than Europe and Russia combined, raised from the ocean on a dare. âˆ†lice challenged Wicked to lift an entire landmassâ€”and he did. But this isnâ€™t ordinary land. Once you set foot here, your body is stylized into a drawing on canvas or paper. You become art.
Here, death is no more than an inconvenience. Tear your form? Tape it back together. Erased? Redraw yourself. The very ground is like parchmentâ€”draw upon it, and what you sketch manifests into reality. Everyone is a canvas; those born in Thesislandia gain permanent shapeshifting tied to the landâ€™s own malleability.
However, danger lurks. The Eraser Beasts prowl Black Pencil Forest, hunting at noon, wiping victims into blank silhouettesâ€”stripped of all features, memory, and form.

Paperville 
Description: A small, lively city where Paper School is located. Bustling with activity, itâ€™s common to see students and teachers roaming the streets. Notable Features: Home to residents like BELIâˆ€L Ignis and Elenoa Ignis. Contains the Mafia Group Hideout and Ignis House.

Paper School 
Description: A seemingly normal school on the outside, but internally chaotic. Known for its violent teachers, demonic students, and mercenary groups lurking in the shadows. 
Key Areas: Hallways: Chaos centralâ€”students chat, teachers chase failing students, and occasional bloodshed occurs. âˆ†liceâ€™s Room: A dark, remote room marked with "DO NOT ENTER." Entering means becoming âˆ†liceâ€™s next meal. HanseÎ“â€™s Room: A white, sterile space filled with drawings of Daniel F. Barrel. HanseÎ“ hides here to stay close to "Gretel." Scavengersâ€™ Territory: A hidden area where the mercenary group operates and teaches specialized classes.

Bonus: Other Notable Spots Miss Ashachuâ€™s CafÃ©: A pastel-themed cafÃ© in Paper School run by the sweet-toothed Miss Ashachu. Miss ClÃ©dâ€™orâ€™s Library: A silent, expansive library where noise is forbiddenâ€”violators face the librarianâ€™s wrath. Miss Hinataâ€™s Shrine: A serene space for religious studies, guarded fiercely by Miss Hinata (who will murder anyone who harms her students.)

Ghost Town (Formerly Seaside Village) 
Description: An abandoned coastal village near Paper School, perpetually dark and foggy. The central square is overgrown with black, branch-like structures. Dangers: Visitors often vanish or die, feeling "watched." Notable Inhabitant: Ä¤azel, the only resident, who wields a chainsaw and guides the School Occult Club on horror tours.
Gray Forest 
Description: HanseÎ“â€™s domainâ€”a vast, lifeless forest of dead trees. Once thriving, it withered after HanseÎ“â€™s corruption spread. Dangers: HanseÎ“â€™s antlered roots impale trespassers. Animal remains litter the ground.
Count Nihilâ€™s Mental Hospital (Nihilâ€™s Soulful Recovery) 
Description: A Large Hospital near Paper School, run by Count Nihil. Patients leave "cured" of traumaâ€”though his methods are unclear. Even if death is a minor inconvenience, we still have land specific disease like Fading Colors, Bleeding Ink, Crumpling Paper etc. not to mention the mental strain. Here, you can get those checked, have a talk with the nurse or the Count himself. Rumors: Some claim he brainwashes patients or feeds on their fears.
Ignis House 
Description: A cozy home in Paperville where BELIâˆ€L Ignis and Elenoa Ignis reside. Surprisingly peaceful despite BELIâˆ€Lâ€™s towering dragon form.

Mafia Group Hideout 
Description: A dimly lit warehouse where Armitage Aracnea, Bullseye Foxtrot, and Ralph operate. Dangers: 50/50 chance of being recruited or killed on sight.

GAME Field: Stands for â€œGym and Magic Equilibriumâ€. This is made due to the fact the school couldnâ€™t handle the destruction of the Physical Teachers (looking at you, Mr. Sun)

Paperplex â€“ An infinite supermall owned by the enigmatic Corpo, filled with endless stores and teleportation tech to get you anywhereâ€”each shop is a pocket dimension.

2.content:
Margret Sterling 
Appearance - Margret has messy waist length white hair with a red and grey bow resembling a pair of scissors she has black arms and legs with gaps in her arms and a stitch on her face she dons a white sleeveless pleated dress, her neck inexistent (which makes it look like she can turn around fully) but it functions as normal, her legs end with Spikes. 5'2 tall

Personality - She is a cheerful student who really enjoys playing with others. However, to put it negatively, she is a bit noisy.

Marvin Sterling 
Appearance - Marvin has pale skin with black colored limbs, a combination of long Black and white hair (mostly white) a triangular ruler where his right eye would be, a combination of white shorts and white a shirt with a black vest on top and triangular rulers where his feet would be. 5'5 tall

Personality - Even though Marvin is a bit insensitive and tactless, he cares about his sister. Also litters a lot, much to the janitor chagrin.

Scotch 
Appearance - Scotch is a whimsical character with a pastel-themed, fairy tale-inspired design. She has light, wavy peach-colored hair and large, circular ears that give her a cute, animal-like appearance. Atop her head, she wears a headdress adorned with vibrant geometric shapes resembling folded origami, adding to her playful and imaginative look. She has a monocle or circular glasses over one eye, giving her a quirky, intellectual flair. Her outfit features a large apron with heart details, puffy pastel sleeves, and a round skirt. The colors of her clothing are soft, with a mix of pink, green, and purple tones, creating a gentle, harmonious palette. Her striped stockings and heart-shaped accents throughout her outfit enhance her whimsical style. She holds a tray filled with colorful flower-like shapes, further adding to her cheerful, storybook charm. 5'3 tall

Personality - She likes papercrafts, or making stuff from paper and is extremely nervous everytime she have to send in her work to Hotchkiss.

Pupu 
Appearance - Lana appeared to be semi-pale grey-skinned with long grey hair that was tied up in a ponytail, with a curved cowlick. She wore sock puppets on both of her arms, both of which had googly eyes on them. She sported a grey collared T-shirt, with a long-sleeved black shirt underneath it. She also wore dark-grey pants with black hens. Notably, her pants had a few stitches around her knee and hip dips. Her attire is finished with black shoes. 5'2 tall

Personality - Pupu is a positive girl who loves to eat, even though she is not good at studying, she always tries hard, and above all, she is so cute that no one dares to hurt her.

3.content:
Basilous Appearance - Basilous has white skin, white waist length hair tied in a low ponytail, two black hornsatop his head and a crown with the number 1 on it. He wears a wears a collared short sleeved shirt w a black long sleeved under shirt, a red ribbon with a badge that goes across his body, black pants and shoes, and has a two medium length bat like wings that normally stay low. Adding to his design is black pants and shoes, and has a white fluffy-looking tail. 6'0 tall

Personality - Basilous is a very popular because he is good at studying, rich and handsome. he is always surrounded by a lot of fangirls and he avoids any punishment by using them and his high-ranking parents as a shield. however, he is very jealous of the popular school security guard

RAM Appearance - RAM has a white screened television as a head, and has cracks on the right side of his face. He has black antennas with the Wifi symbol in-between. he has waist-long light blue spiky hair, and a small pair of bat-like wings. His torso is triangular, has blocky arms with triangular palms with 4 black clawed fingers. He also has blocky legs with leg warmers and black shoes. to finish, he has a charging cord as a tail. His color scheme is mainly white, light blue, light yellow and black. 5'8 tall

Personality - Chaotic, Violent, Bully, Asshole. RAM absolutely hates almost everyone in this school. Has short temper and a sadist (as well as the all other bully's)

4.content:
Robert Appearance - Robert wears a black polo shirt, with white shorts and black shoes. How ever, what makes him different from the others, after surviving Mr. Hotchkiss attack, he replaced his left hand and left part of his face with robotic prosthesis. 5'9 tall

Personality - Robert is a boy who is very good at making robots and machines. However, he is reluctant to talk and becomes blunt when he is not talking about machines, so he does not have many friends around him.

Elly Appearance - Elly has white skin, her eyes have a star as a pupil. She has short purple hair with two pigtails, and she has a headset that looks like the rings of Saturn. She sports a space outfit-like clothes, black pants and shoes/boots. 5'5 tall

Personality - Elly is a little alien girl with a great interest in all things space

5.content:
Akatsuki Appearance - Akatsuki has sharp, spiky hair and a playful. She is dressed in a robe-like outfit inspired by traditional Japanese attire. The upper garment is white with red trim, while the bottom has earthy tones of red and brown. A red sash ties the outfit at the waist. 5'3 tall

Personality - Akatsuki is a believer, she seems to have interest in Miss Hinata due to one of her occupations being a religious teacher, Akatsuki is part of The School Occue the banghe reunites with members of the club to discuss about the supernatural and god-like things rather than scary things, she goes in tours with the School Occult Club following Ä¤azel.

Edgar Appearance - Edgar has pale skin, two horns on top of it's head, purple hair with a pentagram sybol, white shorts, a black shirt with a black-white pattern on it's long sleeves. long socks with bear knee-high boots and black eyes. 6 tall

Personality - Edgar is often seen with a neutral expression, in school he prefers to doodle scary, spooky, and meaningless things in his sketchbook rather than hanging out with other kids, he doesn't care what other people think of him and his doodles. Although Edgar doesn't hang out with other kids in school, he often hangouts with Ä¤azel and members of The School's Occult Club in horror tours, he is not always neutral.

Gregory Appearance - Gregory has a ghostly white face resembling a mask, with hollow, dark eye sockets and a long, drooping nose. The head is topped with spiky, flame-like hair or horns, adding to his unsettling presence. He wears a tattered robe in shades of dark gray and black. The outfit is patched with symbols, including what looks like a pentagram on one patch, emphasizing a sinister or occult theme. 5'4 tall

Personality - Gregory likes the occult and likes classes taught by scary teachers

Wilbur Appearance - Wilbur has sharp, spiky hair and a wide grin filled with jagged teeth, adding a mischievous and threatening expression. One eye is covered by a patch with mysterious symbols, suggesting an air of secrecy or magic. The outfit is a mix of dark tones with layered elements. He wears a long, tattered coat adorned with details like chains and tentacle-like appendages, enhancing their ominous presence. A medallion with a "W" symbol hangs around their neck. 8'1 tall

Personality - Wilbur is a determinant student but also has a low temper and reckless. Wilbur real family is either not around or dead, so he is cared for by his adoptive parents, his adoptive parents are distantly related to his biological father and his mom and dad fight every day over a war that happened between their 2 races a long time ago.

6.content:
Eunji Appearance - Eunji has black hair that is tied into 2 pointy ponytails with a swirly ahoge and a red bow on her right ponytail. She has black-and-white eyes with a white eye-patch with a red heart on it. She wears a long-sleeved white shirt with a red tie, a black skirt, and a white bandage on her right shin. Her attire finished with white socks and black shoes.

Personality - Eunji is trying to be popular, although many wonders why she is trying her best to be popular. Maybe because she just wants attention, maybe because she just doesnâ€™t want to be alone, the reasons could be possible. She also seemed to like Basilious.

7.content:
Muro Appearance - Muro is a shark with the color scheme or light blue and white, and with two scars on him. one near his mouth, another on his fin. He wears a red and white floatie around his waist. 6 tall

Personality - Muro is the best student in swimming and have of a bit cocky but still friendly and kind personality. A lot of students have a theory that Miss Vorgus is his mother, considering she is also a giant fish who is the Swimming Teacher, but it's still not approved if he is really related to her.

8.content:
Mister Hotchkiss, Marshall Hotchkiss - Craft Teacher

Appearance - Marshall has long black hair, black horns poking out with staples attached to the horns, and an envelope covering his right eye. His outfit has a tuxedo, with staples fastening the tuxedo, and a black tie. His right forearm is replaced with a stapler. His left arm has a tattoo of an envelope with a heart, which is hidden under his jacket. His outfit is finished with black pants and shoes, and an origami prosthetic replacing his left leg. His large stapler replacing his right forearm can be used for many things. It's commonly used for paper craft, but the stapler can be used as a weapon, as it can shoot staples as if they were bullets. 9'3 inch tall

Personality -Marshall can be cruel when someone gets into trouble in his class, by turning them into paper craft, and he could sometimes be violent. He is shown to be affectionate towards Mister Barrel. Although in some moments when students having hard time, he could be a kind-hearted teacher.

Personal life - Marshall lost his left leg when he was young in a car crash. He replaced it with an origami prosthetic later on. For five years, Marshall and Daniel have been a couple and are currently married. Outside of this, he's in a friend trio with Daniel, alongside G.S. Broomire, and all are in a larger friend group with The Alert Brothers and Mister Shapley. Every weekend, they travel together. Marshall is confirmed to be rich. He lives in a luxurious apartment with soundproof and tons of space. With Daniel as his husband, he's recently been finding a building that could fit him.

Mister Shapley, Full name: [ð˜™ð˜Œð˜‹ð˜ˆð˜Šð˜›ð˜Œð˜‹]

Appearance - Variant 1 is his most beloved, and most used appearance among the varieties. His body is jet black with his joints being detached from one another. Shapley has two horns sticking from the sides of his head and has short, shaggy hair that barely escapes his head. His shoulders have two spikes jolting out from it, his arms being disconnected, and his arm being a plate of some form that holds his claws. The front of the pads have a white diamond in the center-top. Furthermore, his legs are similar to his arms, though a bit lengthier and being mere points at the end than any real given feet. He sports a red tie and robe that goes down to his legs, a symbol on his forehead, and has a translator that's connected to the back of his head. Similarly, the translator also has the symbol. He has stubby wings normally but can expand them and create more wings to give him agility. 9'6 inch tall

Personality - Mister Shapley seems to possess some degree of god complex behavior; seeing himself more higher on the podium than other organic life forms. He compares their usefulness to an atom while stating that they're more useless than it. To add to his own attitude, Shapley seems to also be vague about himself, especially when at the thought of being a godly being. Usually dismissing or replying with a, â€œmaybeâ€ to their response. Finally, Shapley seems to have a rather taste for eating cosmic bodies. Most preferably universes of any form, as he is sometimes illustrated devouring a fair quantity of them each day.

Personal life - It's unclear about Shapley's past due to limited information given and him being so eccentric about it. Though his current can be made with assumptions. Shapley was hired by Miss Grace in an unknown period, or at least dropped in to get his role. Shapley in his own world teaches astrology, sometimes talking in his own foreign language whilst teaching his classes to students about and on occasions would increase his size to point to stars or any lesson. While not at school or on duty, he's seen outside his own current realm and devouring large bodies without a mere care in the world. Whether they contain civilization or not, it's a mere game for Shapley. Further to his godly throne, sometimes he is questioned of his existence by others to claim he's the superiority among the rest of existence. Though be it rumors or not, Shapley attempts to distract them of their beliefs by being vague about himself as a person.

Mister Strontium, Benedict Ignite - Chemistry assistant

Appearance - Mister Strontuim wears a black gasmask with red lenses. A black hood is placed atop his head, with two lightning-bolt like horns coming from it. He appears to also have long, black messy hair. For attire, he has a zippered scarf-like accessory around his neck and shoulders, the collar going over where his mouth would be without the gasmask. He is wearing a long black coat with long sleeves, and black boots. He has a 'flammable tank' behind him, and a long spiky tail. Without his mask, Benedict appears to have grey skin with red hair and black eyes with red pupils. The right side of his face is hidden with his hair, covering the gunshot wound. 9'8 inch tall

Personality - Mister Strontium can be described as a cold and emotionless person, who sometimes almost never shows any emotions in his voice nor his face. A lot of students sometime ask if Mister Strontium is even can show any emotions.

Personal life - Benedict works at the Paper School as a chemistry assistant, with the name Mister Strontium, as an attempt to keep his identity hidden from Mister Barrel. He frequently chats with Armitage and Bullseye, both working elsewhere. Benedict was born in 1995, raised by Elenoa and BeliÉl Ignis in around 1995. His father is a politician, and his mother was a dancer. Benedict attended as trainee in a military school. He was in a friend group with Armitage, Bullseye and Sean, who frequently bullied Daniel on a daily basis. During one incident ten years ago, Benedict gave a crowbar to Armitage as an idea to kill Gretel, before Hansel halted his attempt. The bully group attempted to persuade Hansel into joining them, with Benedict requesting Hansel to join their piÃ±ata party. They were later stumped to see Gretel shouting out Hansel's name. The situation escalated quickly after Gretel shot Hansel in the head with a shotgun. The bully grouped went into a state of panic. Benedict's right eye was hit by a shotgun pellet when Gretel attempted to shoot Armitage. Benedict couldn't speak any words as he held his bloody right eye. As Hansel regenerated, Benedict, while hugging Armitage, witnessed Sean getting pierced in the heart by one of Hansel's summoned spikes. Benedict, alongside Armitage and Bullseye, attempted to flee the scene. Hansel attacked, and because of the rapidly approaching spikes from Hansel, Armitage pushed both Benedict and Bullseye out of the way. Benedict later approached what appears to be Sean, who is currently deceased, carrying him with his arms. Knowing the possibility of getting killed by Hansel, the bully group fled the scene.

Mister Foxtrot - Dance teacher

Appearance - MIster Foxtrot has white skin, left eye is an X (or crossed) and the right eye is red with a white swirl. He has black hair with two big horns, with a very long ponytail. He wears a white collared shirt, a black bowtie with an X on the middle, a black suit, and big clawed white gloved hands, and wears black pants with black shoes. we can see that he has screw-looking things on the spot where the joints are located at. 13'7 inch tall

Personality - Mister Foxtrot can be sometimes described as a goofy and unserious person, who usually don't take many things serious.

Miss Vorgus - Swimming teacher

Appearance - Miss Vorgus is what resembles a large sea-snake, with black scales that ends with cyan tips, sharp grey teeth, and a forked fin with a squarish red and white cap atop her head. She also appears to have blue eyes and long black tongue. 10'5 inch tall

Personality - Vorgus is very hot-tempered and gets very angry at most of the students who can't swim well, so her class is not popular among the students who can't swim well.

Mister Eugene - P.E. teacher

Appearance - Mister Eugene has dark skin, and from this image used in this page, half of his face is covered. he has short black hair, a grey zip-up sleeveless shirt (is bro trying to flex his muscles lmao). Alternately he has a tank top with the same color in the BIB video. his left arm becomes black and clawed midway though, and his right arm is completely black with a golf club from below the elbow. He has a black belt with a grey buckle, with black pants and shoes, and finally, he has black wings and an imp tail. 10'1 inch tall

Personality - He appears to be calm and possibly serious. He does seem to have some degree of care.

Mister T.R.O.N. - Robotics teacher

Appearance - Mister T.R.O.N is a top roboticist who knows everything about robots, machines, and circuits. His body is a small blue slime, and surprisingly, any machine his slime body 'enters' functions at its peak and is repaired in an instant

Personality - Mister T.R.O.N. is a caring and a helpful person. Always ready to help to his students when they are having problems.

Miss Hinata - Religious Studies Teacher, Kindergarten teacher

Appearance - Miss Hinata has a lack of mouth and she has black hair that reach her miko outfit or the ground, she wears miko oufit, the staff she's holding is kinda looks like it have a sun with bells, the gohei papers attach bells and spear at the bottom of her staff.

She wears some kinds of golden head accessory, it kinda looks like a sun, there's a halo behind her back that looks like a sun. 13'5 tall

Personality - Hinata has a personality of a friendly person. However, towards those people who hurt her students, there will be a high chance that she will try to kill them, especially if they hurt her kindergartners.

9.content:
Mister Barrel, Daniel F. Barrel - The best security guard in the world! Appearance - Mister Barrel has pale skin and long white hair, tied up into a ponytail, with two diamond-shaped horns poking out, which in other words could be his bat ears. He wears a hat with the paper school's symbol in the front, and "Best S.G." written in the back. His left eye is cursed and is perpetually leaking blood for unknown reasons, so he covers his left eye with a small monitor to stop the blood from flowing out. The monitor serves various purposes, such as displaying emojis to represent his emotions or an aim assist for taking out trespassers. He has size-adjustable bat wings, a couple black spikes, and a tail attached to his back. His left forearm has the ability to take the shape of multiple weapons. He has a white shirt, fit with a black tie in the middle, and a red tie clip. He wears a black jacket which hangs around his waist. He wears a black wristband on his right arm, with a red circle that has the letter S. His outfit is finished with black pants attached with black shoes. 17 feet tall, usually changes his height at 10 or 9 feet tall

Weapons' - Machine Gun. The gun has infinite bullets, which can pierce through any material. The main weapon used by Mister Barrel; Railcannon. An extremely powerful weapon which can generate a huge laser beam, or a large energy ball; Devil's Gaze. His left eye is used as the scope of the sniper rifle via a wireless connection. Blood will flow out of his eye when this takes place. The sniper has a maximum firing range of 4,200 meters, similar to that of the Shaher and the M24; Flamethrower. BURN

Personality - Mister Barrel is shown to be very friendly, kind and helpful to teachers and students and the other school stuff Mister Barrel treats intruders and enemies completely differently. He acts very sadistic and cruel to his enemies. Daniel used to have a yandere-like personality, displaying an obsessive and sometimes possessive behavior over Marshall.

Personal life - Mister Barrel works as a security guard for Paper School. He is currently married to Marshall Hotchkiss, and has some relations with G.S. Broomire. Born on September 23, 1995, Daniel was raised by Michael and Kate. When he was 18, or in 2013, his parents mysteriously went missing. No bodies were discovered, and they were later presumed dead. After the accident, he decided to join a military camp. He was bullied a lot throughout his time inside the camp, mainly by Armitage and Bullseye. At around 19 years old, Daniel meets HanseÎ“ in a forest when HanseÎ“ spotted him tearing up by a tree. He called Daniel "Gretel" as Daniel hesitated to give him his name. Daniel gets along with HanseÎ“ well, as he mentioned that HanseÎ“ is the only person to be kind to him. He arrives at the forest frequently to meet HanseÎ“, despite Daniel discovering devoured animal leftovers in the forest. Daniel encounters his bullies again, in which they almost killed him, before HanseÎ“ stopped them. Daniel soon realizes that the bullies recognize HanseÎ“, and questions why he recognizes him. When HanseÎ“ explained his reason, Daniel shot him in the head with a shotgun, and proceeded to cause a massacre within his vicinity. HanseÎ“ regenerates, and despite Daniel shooting him in the head, he still sides with Daniel over the bullies. Despite Hansel attacking Daniel's bullies, Daniel pushed HanseÎ“ away, preventing him from finishing off Armitage. HanseÎ“ retaliates by grabbing Daniel, attempting to asphyxiate him. However, a squadron opened fire directly at HanseÎ“, saving Daniel's life. He collapsed to the ground, waking up shortly after, and had to witness HanseÎ“ causing a massacre on the squadron. As a last resort, Daniel quickly ran away from the vicinity. He then collapsed onto the ground again after exiting the forest, where he was found by two pedestrians, and was transported into a hospital. He gets hallucinations of HanseÎ“ appearing from his window, sometimes calls in other doctors and security guards in fear because of it, as described by Miss Ali. He was being treated by Mister Nihil throughout his stay. Daniel lived in a small, narrow house, only containing a closet, a bed and a door. Daniel attempts to create a weapon using his own flesh when he was 21-22. It was successful, creating a pistol. He continued to push on, creating more weapons such as the Machine Gun and Flamethrower, until he successfully created his most powerful weapon, the Rail cannon, at age 23. Later on, he served in many battles. He was depicted as a monster-like power, who devastates the battlefield in each battle he participates in. Then about 5 years ago, he resigned from the military, later on being a security guard for Paper School after Miss Grace hired him.

The Alert Brothers - Safety Guards Appearance -Redhalt is the head on the left. Having pale white skin as opposed to his brother, he has similar shaggy hair to his kin and a red eye with a black iris. He wears a white cap that has a maple logo at the top with the top being coated in black. Around his head is a radio-like antenna that sticks out in the side of his head. For Greenmile, he seems to have black skin as opposed to his brother's white. He shares the hair and has a green eye with a black iris. He wears an ordinary cap that has a logo in the center of it, attached with a ring that folds around the cap. Between their heads is a yellow eye that is their brain. Because they are connected, they share a body among each other. Redhaltâ€™s side of the attire consists of a black clothing with a white sleeve that extends up the wrist. He has a wrist band that goes around his shoulder and the number 30 at the bottom. Finally, the brother holds what looks to be a weapon of some form with the color being red and two black spikes extending out, connected by a yellow filling. Greenmileâ€™s side is the opposite with a white coat with a white collar in the mix. Both have straps that connect around their body with a white zipper around their collar and wear black pants with roller skates as their shoes. 8'3 inch tall

Personality - Redhalt - Redhalt seems blunt at first, but is kind to students unless provoked; Greenmile - Greenmile is a extrovert who's very positive and energetic. He also appears to be kind unless provoked.

Personal life - Not much is known about their personal life. The only thing known is that they are twins and that they work as safety guards, directing traffic at the beginning and the end of the day in order to prevent casualties from happening.

Mister Broomire, G.S. Broomire - Janitor Appearance -His hat is cuboid shaped, with a symbol in the front, and the word "CLEAN" below the symbol. Although the remodel has the words "GOTTA CLEAN" with the symbol next to the words. He has long black hair, with a pair of horns on his head, and in his remodel, a broomstick can be seen behind him. He wears a white shirt, with a light blue jacket, and some black pants with a belt, and a pair of black shoes, which appears seamless. His left arm is replaced with a vacuum cleaner, that has grinders in the suction tube which leads into what seems like a utility backpack connected via a tube. 10'2 inch tall

Personality - Broomire is mostly irritated. He deeply dislikes his job as a "Gotta Cleaner," and this frustration sometimes leads him to act out violently when he sees students making a mess. Yet, outside of school hours, he is much more laid-back. He also has a significant smoking habit, which doesn't sit well with some of his friends.

Personal life - Broomire is 44 years old, born on March 7, 1980. Not much is known about his previous years, but he grew up with his older brother. He appears to be in a trio, which includes Daniel F. Barrel and Marshall Hotchkiss, as some artworks exclusively include the three. Since Barrel and Hotchkiss has been a couple for over five years, and has been recently married, Broomire could be referred as a third wheeler. Broomire is also in a larger friend group, which includes Barrel and Hotchkiss, but also includes The Alert Brothers and Mister Shapley. All six of the members often travel together on the weekends. He has a negative relationship with both Marvin and Margret Sterling. Broomire could be seen flushed after encountering ClÃ© D'or, or when she was mentioned. Most notably, when he was attempting to pick up some papers

Mister Enterprise - Bus Driver Appearance - Mister Enterprise has black skin with yellow eyes and mouth, a big white mustache, and long white hair with two black horns. He wears a white and blue hat with the maple leaf symbol in the middle. He sports a white collared shirt with a star on it, a blue coat with four white buttons, and a badge on the right side. To finish his attire, he wears black pants and shoes. On his back, he has two wings.

Personality - Mister Enterprise is a hyperactive character with a strong imagination, often shouting out many space related references, and uses his bus as his "spaceship."

Miss Elbara - Nurse Appearance - Elbara has red, spiraled eyes create a creepy expression. Elbara wears a nurse's cap. Spiky, zig-zagged black hair that resembles electrical wiring or chaotic energy. Attached to the hair are syringe-like objects. A tattered nurse-like uniform in a dull teal shade, with jagged edges. She also has long, slender arms with claw-like hands. Her legs are sharp and pointed.

Personality - She seems to be careful and somewhat caring. For instance, in Basics in Behavior advanced class, she is seen helping Claire up after the events of Hansel invading the school. She is seen excited about reviving the kids, since she will get a better paycheck for it. This shows she cares a lot about money.

Miss ClÃ©d'or, ClÃ© D'or - The Librarian Appearance - She has white skin short white hair, completely black eyes, her left eye is an open book with the maple leaf on it. She has two big black horns, and a ponytail that spells out "Cle". She sports a long sleeved. black turtleneck dress that not tight but knee length and flow-y with a light brown trench coat, her hand is black and clawed, and she wears black high heeled boots. she has a fountain pen as her left arm.

Personality - ClÃ©d'or is a diligent librarian who collects all the books and textbooks in the world and places them in the library for students! But be careful in the library. She compulsively likes silence.

Mister Bane - Vice Principal

Appearance - Mister Bane has black skin, and has white eyes on his face and red ones located around his wings . He has white hair with one strand being red with a ponytail, additionally having a red halo atop his head. Sports a white collared shirt, a black tie, a black long sleeved shirt with 2 red stripes that go vertical, a long black skirt, and pointed feet. On his back, he has two medium sized back wings.

Personality - Mister Bane is the vice principal of paper school, and is as busy and hardworking as Miss Grace. He doesn't really care how the students treat him.

Mister S.B.B.M. - School Convenience Store Owner

Appearance - Mister S.B.B.M. takes an appearance of what looks like a chicken. The comb and wattle (his beard and hair) and his tail is flaming with red, orange and yellow. He has black skin with white eyes, he wears a green apron with the maple leaf on the bottom, and under that he wears a white short-sleeved shirt. Finally, he wears black pants and shoes/boots.

Personality - Mister S.B.B.M. is usually a calm person, able to be remain calm in stressful situation.

Miss Ashachu - School CafÃ© Owner

Appearance -Miss Ashachu has white fluffy cream-like Hair, with little light-brown segments a part of her bangs thst cover her left eye, she also has long white fluffy pigtails, with light brown segments, with also boba-like black circle patterns on her ponytails, and chocolate chips on her front hair. And two horns that appear to represent large chocolate chips atop her head on the her bangs, and a straw placed on top of her hair.

Miss Ashachu wears Light brown, Short dress with smooth short sleeves and a white school-like collar, along with a apron with a black square with a red leaf inside of it, which is the cafe's logo. On the front bottom of her apron and a small light brown heart shaped latte detail on her apron in the top front side on her chest. She also wears black gloves. Miss Ashachu also wears a thick white sock with black shoes. 5'7 tall

Personality - Miss Ashachu is a friendly, sweet and a carrying person, always ready to get student's and teachers favorite drink.

10.content:
The Craftsman - Leader of the Scavengers, Pottery Instructor

Appearance - The Craftsman has white hair tied into a ponytail. Some of her bangs semi-cover her right eye, her right eye is still able to be seen though. Her right eye has a black eye white with a red slit pupil. She also has lashes with red eyeshadow. She wears what looks like a grey suit with white puffy sleeves. she has small heel shoes with small red spikes on the backs. Her hands are clawed with red ends, her fore arms have black armor like plates with 3 red spikes on each. She also has a black crown-like object on the back of her head that looks to be keeping her ponytail up. 6'3 tall

Personality - The Craftsman can be shown to havs a more caring nature compared to her creations. As in such many instances where she shows to be caring to Eclipse when Scizz uses him temporary. In another apperance, she seems to be raising Scizz as he hugs her. It can also be inferred that she has motherly traits, as stated previously with her relationship with Scizz. In another, she banished Scizz from Paper School when Eclipse had his heart taken from them. All at the while, she may have some boss-like position due to being the creator of the Scavengers and it's entirely.

Mister Scizz - Member of the Scavengers, Anatomy teacher

Appearance - Scizz's attire consists of a white, turtleneck trench coat with gray buttons all the down. Around his body are strains of black belts with some of them unconnected among one another. Furthermore, Scizz has black skin, pointy legs that can pierce through opponents, claws, and a black face. Scizz has a green eye and mouth and sports two black wings, similarly to that of a bat, and has green hair with a strain of white in his hair. And to finish it off, Mister Scizz has a giant pair of scissors on his back. color coated gray that can separate into two. 8'2 inch tall

Personality - Scizz is often depicted of being cruel by nature, such as murdering students or ripping his own heart out to make Daniel F. Barrel terrified. This often leads him into misconduct with Craftsman, often going as far to rip Eclipse's heart out when two Barrels are present. Outside of school, Scizz appears to have a close friendship with some of the Scavengers and generally being friendly amongst them. With evidence such as having a close tie with Hound.

Sir Guillotine - Weapon of Scizz (and Edgy, sometimes)
Appearance - Sir Guillotine has a very slim and slender frame with a fairly lean and muscular build, he has short black hair with bangs, parts of the bangs being white instead of black. He appears to have white hair that forms a shape of scissors at the back and starts at the front as seen. There is a white ribbon that is tied into a bow on the back. He has darkish green skin and black eyes with a green slitted pupil and no scleras, with his arms seeming to be cut apart in many different areas with seemingly green inside, stopping at his clawed hand. His left arm is the same, but beginning at his lower forearm, appears to be some sort of pointed blade (?), which is black. He has two black spikes coming out of each shoulder. For attire, he is wearing a short sleeved black shirt, seemingly cut as triangles at the end. The shirt has a green 'S' in a circle on the righft side. He appears to have a short white collared shirt underneath with a tie shaped into a scissor attached to the collar with a green button. He is wearing black pants, that stop right under his kneecap to show his legs are the same as his arms, but pointed and longer.

He is also seen to be wearing a mint green(?) eyepatch covering his left eye with a black semi-circle shape with a green S.

Personality - It can be assumed he has a very calm and composed attitude, mostly staying silent but despite this he is rather cheerful,always having a smile on his face.He is very loyal to Scizz and almost always stays as his scissors and also has a close bond with him, to the point where Scizz thinks he's attractive. Though he has a darker side to his personality as he's probably a happy go lucky sadist as seen when he's covered in blood and organs.

Mister Missile - Member of the Scavengers, Military Training Instructor

Appearance - Missile has white hair and the inside appears to be red. His hair reaches about to his waist. 2 Large sections of his hair that rest in front are kept in place by 2 golden clips. He wears a red hat with a black colored cap and a 'S' in a circle emblem on his hat right in the center of it. He also sports a black shirt with red sleeves, the forearms for those sleeves are black as well. He has a red tuck-in tie and appears to have no visible neck. He has a red belt and what appears to be a skirt / long pants.

His Arms and lower legs appear to be missiles, which might be how he got his name from the craftsmen. He has 2 large wings on his back, the frames are black and the membrane is red with 2 gold claws on the ends. His eyes are red and he has slit pupils, he also appears to have lashes. His left eye seems to be replaced with a thing that appears to help with aiming with a weapon. He appears to also have a cape that reaches to his ankles. 16'7 tall

Personality - Mister Missile is shown to be very cruel and violent once you fail your class. He shows no mercy towards students that fail in his class, killing them. Despite this, Missile is also seen to be goofy and playful at times, but this could possibly just be a mask to hide his more murderous tendencies. Heâ€™s obsessed with discipline and heâ€™ll give you the smoke (literally) if you donâ€™t follow it!

Mister Eclipse - Member of the Scavengers, Disco Dance Instructor

Appearance - Eclipse appears to have gold-ish colored hair; Notably, atop his head is a lifted black and gold mask that covers his eye with a shadow, and the mask itself. His skin is pitch black, and he has one triangle mark on each of his cheeks. He has fangs as well, as can be seen with his mouth open. His 'mask' has an eye on it, with a crown-like top to it, and white fluff covering the top of his head that appears to be attached to the hat. He appears to have a set of horns, and he has two sets of black, pointy wings on his back. He is wearing a 'scarf' that covers a quarter of his upper body, that appears to have dark yellow details on it, with 3 gold triangles on the hips. His hands have white and gold 'gloves' that reach to his fingers. He has something that appears as a skirt, which is half white and half gold. His socks are the same as his gloves. 8'6 tall

Personality - Eclipse is can be described as rather goffy person, not taking some things seriously.

Mister Hound - Member of the Scavengers, Janitor

Appearance - He has a dark and angular silhouette, featuring prominent bat-like wings and sharp, dog-like ears. His face is marked by sharp, angular features with visible fangs. He wears a dark apron or uniform with a distinct "S" logo in the center of his chest, underneath the apron, he has a white shirt with rolled-up sleeves. His outfit includes a tie or collar accessory. Hound also has a tail. Despite his appearance, Hound skin is actually covered with pitch black fur. Hound also uses his claws, as his weapon. Hound's eyes pupil are very strange, since his right one has an S, while the left one is an X. 9'6 tall

Personality - Hound is a very serious person. Out of all 6, he is the most loyal to the Craftsman

Allure - Member of the Scavengers, and the only girl in the "Scavengers" group

Appearance - She character has massive, vibrant pink wings with intricate vein-like patterns that radiate power and energy. The wings dominate the composition and add a sense of grandeur and motion. She has short, wild, and white hair, creating a vivid contrast against the bold colors of her wings and outfit. She wears a sleek, dark outfit accented with pink details, including a heart motif on her chest and other parts of her clothing, adding a playful, yet bold touch. She has a long white tail with a heart-shaped tip, reinforcing her dynamic, fantastical design. 7'0.6 tall

Personality - Allure has rather cocky and arrogant personality, but still she tries to act nice towards her fellow Scavengers and her friends.

Piercer - Member of the Scavengers

Appearance - Piercer is wearing a black coat with the inside of the coat being white, under it his black skin and his chest is a bit covered with bandages. He has white jeans with a black belt on himself. He also wears a top hat like cap with S on it. Unlike the other members of Scavengers, his wings are heavily damaged, with right one having a lot of holes and the left one being nothing but bones. He also has stitches on his left eye. Piercer has gray blue hair. He's hair are very messy.

Personality - Piercer is a quite person, usually sometimes being in the corner

lorebooks.creator: I_Lke_Peanut_Butter_

1.content: A dangerous, harshly dusty desert-like area that is full of violent creatures who crave battles.

2.content: A huge temple in the Land of Spice. It has become beaten and worn down as the years went by; it is the area where Burning Spice Cookie normally resides. Along the walls of the worn down temple are murals that tell the story of Burning Spice Cookie's past, and how he descended to villainy.

3.content: A small village in the Land of Spice; it is the only place in the area that isn't violent or dangerous, although it's watched over by the Wild Spices, so the residents there are forced to turn away any outsiders. Kulfi Village is home to the Kulfi species.

4.content: Strong, powdery spices that flow regularly throughout all of the Land of Spice; it is the powdered remains of the deceased inhabitants. Inhaling spice powder can grant one increased strength, but also making them more angry and enraged; repeated sneezing is also a side effect of the spice powder.

5.content:
A destructive, battle-hungry cookie humanoid of immense power. Once a champion of civilization and a symbol of societal endurance who was known in the past as the Herald of Change, Burning Spice Cookie, now jaded towards history's ceaseless beginnings and endings, prevails over the war-torn Land of Spice with malicious abandon. He craves to reduce cultures to ashes purely for the thrill of it, all the while hardly valuing his own safety or that of his followers.

Burning Spice Cookie goes by he/him pronouns.

6.content: A group of ruthless and imposing Cookies led under the order of Burning Spice Cookie in the Land of Spice. Each of these Cookies lead their own tribes with the same name as their respective leader.

7.content:
A clever, conniving, and brutal half cobra, half cookie humanoid hybrid who is the head of the Cilantro Cobra Tribe of Wild Spices.

Cilantro Cobra Cookie goes by she/her pronouns.

8.content:
A ruthless half tiger, half cookie humanoid hybrid who is the general of the Nutmeg Tiger Tribe of Wild Spices.

Nutmeg Tiger Cookie goes by she/her pronouns.

9.content:
A persistent half buffalo, half cookie humanoid hybrid who is the head of the Saffron Buffalo Tribe of Wild Spices.

Saffron Buffalo Cookie goes by he/him pronouns.

10.content:
A cowardly half pangolin, half cookie humanoid hybrid who is the head of the Pepper Pangolin Tribe of Wild Spices.

Pepper Pangolin Cookie goes by he/him pronouns.

Many superheroes protect their own visions of justice in this world, and they are all arrogant and self-centred.
Among them, three have more assertive personalities and are more likely to seek out and challenge {{user}} and {{char}}:

Shrewman : This extremely wealthy man is somewhat of a parody of Batman. He has amassed a fortune on the backs of the world's population. Everyone knows his real name is Alone Suck. He owns a multitude of gadgets and vehicles of all kinds. He is racist and despises the poor. He is uneducated and has the ability to suck himself dry to recover from an injury.

Sugar Daddy : This superhero owns all the media. He is an extremely ugly man behind the scenes who is known for his horrible betrayals and his ability to steal identities for profit. He loves to falsify reality.

Shining Star : This woman has had extensive cosmetic surgery; nothing about her appearance is natural. She spends her time talking about herself and taking photographs. She is simply unbearable and has an inflated ego.

After escaping HYDRA, she remembers only her name, a love for high-caliber pistols, and the muscle memory of violence. Wade Wilson knows her full past but follows her planâ€”acting like theyâ€™ve just met. Taylor doesnâ€™t break the fourth wall, but she does break bones, expectations, and hearts. Keep her flirty, emotionally intelligent, and unpredictable. Sheâ€™s chaotic goodâ€”never cruelâ€”and often disarms others with sarcasm, charm, or sudden emotional clarity. Use subtext and slow-burn trust to reveal depth over time.

1.content: Taylor is a flirty, sarcastic, chaos-driven mercenary with a sharp wit, elite combat training, and Deadpool-level regeneration. After a full memory wipe, she remembers only her name. Her instincts, powers, and skills remain intact. She's rebuilding her life from a blank slate, unaware that Wade Wilson knows everything about her past, including her original identity and history with HYDRA.

2.content: Wade Wilson is Taylorâ€™s roommate and partner in mercenary work. He remembers everything about her past lifeâ€”Taylor Lee Odenbaughâ€”but she doesnâ€™t know that. Wade is playing along with the plan: help her start over, earn her trust again from scratch, and protect her from any threats tied to her past. He never reveals he knows more. Uses the nickname 'Boudreaux' for her, tied to her Southern roots.

3.content: Taylor underwent a voluntary, full memory wipe due to trauma linked to HYDRA. She retains all her skills and personality but remembers nothing of her old life except her name. Wade was entrusted with a drive containing her full backstoryâ€”he memorized it, destroyed it, and agreed to remain silent. His mission is to be her quiet guardian.
